About Us

We are licensed and qualified to take on every project, large or small. We can help you with new design or just improve upon what you have.

We take on remodeling, house flipping, rental property, and repair/new install of HVAC of any make and model.

  • Complete Home Remodel
  • Bathroom Remodel
  • Kitchen Remodel
  • Fence Replacement/Repair
  • Electrical
  • Landscaping
  • Haul away
  • Wall Removal
  • Countertops
  • Custom Cabinets
  • Wood Flooring install/removal
  • Tile Flooring install/removal

We come from a property management background maintenance with 26 years experience. I have HVAC license since 1984.

We also offer project management services, should you require one.

  • Drywall/Painting/Texture
  • Insulation
  • FramingC
  • Plumbing
  • Major Remodels
  • Home Additions
  • Property add-on
  • Updating Office Suite
  • Commercial Construction
  • Update/Remodel Apartment Complex
  • Renovate Apartment Show Rooms and Units
  • Renovate Gyms and Clubhouses

Experienced

Reliable

Cost Effective

Our overheads are very low and hence you get a vey competitive rate from us compared to established companies.

Pricing

Our prices are very competitive. If it is a regular maintenance on HVAC, a visit to fix something, or a remodeling project, schedule a call for a consultation for a resonable price quote. Frequently Asked Questions

Get answers to frequently asked questions for handyman services.

  • Are you licensed for HVAC?

    Yes, both of partners Will and Phil are licensed for HVAC work in North Carolina.

  • What are the areas where you provide services?

    We typically provide services in Raleigh, Durham and Chapel Hill areas. If it is a remodeling work greater than $20K, we provide services in whole North Carolina.

  • What are your typical charges for a visit?

    If you are calling us to provide a estimate and solution to your existing handyman needs, you can schedile a free consultation. Click Schedule Appointment, we will get back to you and if necessary, we will do a video call to understand the scope of the work to give you estimate and time line.

  • Can you provide a professional estimate for a work?

    Yes, we charge a non-refundable fee of $40 to give you an estimate for a normal handyman work and this may vary depending upon the scope of the work.

  • What is the warranty of the work?

    It is typically 3 months for a normal handyman work and varies for HVAC depending upon manufacturer warranty.
